title: Lui ral mawi tak leh nuam takah khianin
lyrics:
Lui ral mawi tak leh nuam takah khianin,
Mi ropui sang tam takte an awm;
An zinga kan Tlantu ropui tak awm chu,
Amah chu tluk thei tu nge awm ang?

Amah chu sang sawm zingah a tha ber,
Amah fakin lawmin fawn vel r'u;
Kawng engkim, engkima ngaihnatawm ber chu,
Kan chatuan hlimna hla a ni ang.

Engkim engkima ngainatawm ber chuan,
Zaidam takin tunah a ko che;
Ka thla, chhandamna ropui hi hnar suh la,
A thlawnin tunah a hlan a che.

Engkim engkima ngainatawm ber chuan,
A ko che, a aw nem ngaithla la-
"Nang thawkrim leh phur rit tak chu lo kal la,
Tin, i phur rit ka lo chhawk ang che.
